DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase 1 study of anti-IGF-IR CP-751,871 in patients with solid tumors currently enrolling patients 9 years old and older with Ewing's sarcoma family of tumors (Ewing's, PNET and Askin's).
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Anti-IGF-IR CP-751,871 In Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of Ewing's sarcoma family tumors Concurrent treatment with any other anti tumor agents
